parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post refers to Mircea Geoană, who is associated with the Partidul România în Acțiune (PRA). While not explicitly stating he is a candidate, the context strongly implies his involvement in the party's activities, which are directly related to the parliamentary elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and the link directs to a website article. This indicates an intention to reach a wide audience, not just a specific individual.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post highlights the return of Cristian Lungu and the support of Mircea Geoană to the Partidul România în Acțiune (PRA). This information is presented in a way that aims to positively influence public perception of the party and potentially increase votes for its candidates in the upcoming parliamentary elections. The objective is clearly to promote the party and its associated figures.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post is presented as an opinion piece, its primary purpose is not objective journalism. The focus is on promoting a specific political party and its figures, rather than providing balanced and unbiased information. The language used is promotional and suggestive, not neutral and informative.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional piece for a political party. Even if presented as an opinion, the clear intention is to influence voters' choices in the election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1281676142849091</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Opinii Independente, promotes Partidul România în Acțiune (PRA) by highlighting the involvement of Mircea Geoană.  While not explicitly calling for votes, the positive portrayal of Geoană and the party aims to influence voters' choices. The post targets a wide audience through Facebook advertising, fulfilling the criteria of electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. The post's timing, after the official end of the electoral campaign, further strengthens the case for a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post's content, focusing on the positive aspects of PRA and its association with Mircea Geoană, clearly aims to sway public opinion in favor of the party. The paid nature of the post, reaching an estimated 10K-50K people, amplifies its potential impact.  The lack of a CMF number does not negate the promotional nature of the post.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Mircea Geoană</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Opinii Independente</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Opinii Independente, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID: 1281676142849091), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează Partidul România în Acțiune (PRA) prin evidențierea implicării lui Mircea Geoană, având un efect electoral pozitiv asupra PRA. Postarea, cu o estimare a vizualizărilor de 10.000-50.000, îndeplinește criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, prin referirea directă la un candidat (implicit, prin asocierea cu PRA), adresarea către publicul larg și obiectivul electoral clar.  Lipsa unui număr CMF nu diminuează caracterul promoțional al postării.  Publicarea după încheierea campaniei electorale constituie o încălcare a articolului 98 t).  Postarea, accesibilă la [link-ul postării], conține imagini și text care promovează pozitiv PRA și Mircea Geoană, influențând opinia publică în favoarea partidului.  Suma cheltuită pentru publicitate este sub 100 RON.  Datele de contact ale Opinii Independente sunt office@opinii-independente.ro și +40723074107.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
